This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsstate prison guard, manning a tower on the perimeter. i was looking to the east. i saw an object come into my view from the the right. i thought it was an airplane and i immediately thought, that the airspace is dangerously close. reality is, the oblect was at an unknown range. i didn't hear any noise. about 5 seconds into seeing this, i began seeing sparks being emmited. object was in view for at least another 5 seconds and it was gone. the object was a white cole and the sparks were orange\white. could have been space debris but could not have been an aircraft or meteor. thanks
Summary: single object, slow moving, with sparks
